shortdesc.ph: Used to set the source of the audio stream for local audio mixing.
Used to set the source of local mixed audio stream.

plentry.pd: Remote user ID. This parameter must be set when the source type of the local mixed audio stream is AUDIO_SOURCE_REMOTE_USER.

pd.note: This parameter must be set when the source type of the local mixed audio stream is AUDIO_SOURCE_REMOTE_CHANNEL or AUDIO_SOURCE_REMOTE_USER.
pd.ph: Channel name. This parameter indicates the channel where users engage in real-time audio and video interaction. Users with the same App ID and channel name will join the same channel for interaction. The string length must not exceed 64 bytes. Supported characters (89 total):

ul.li: All lowercase letters: a to z.
All uppercase letters: A to Z.

plentry.pd: Audio track ID. Set to the custom audio track ID returned by . This parameter must be set when the source type of the local mixed audio stream is AUDIO_SOURCE_CUSTOM.
Remote user ID. This parameter is required only when the source type of the local mixed audio stream is AUDIO_SOURCE_REMOTE_USER.

Channel name. The string length must not exceed 64 bytes. Supported characters (89 total): lowercase a-z, uppercase A-Z, digits 0-9, and the following symbols: !, #, $, %, &, (, ), +, -, :, ;, <, =, ., >, ?, @, [, ], ^, _, {, }, |, ~, , This parameter is required only when the source type of the local mixed audio stream is AUDIO_SOURCE_REMOTE_CHANNEL or AUDIO_SOURCE_REMOTE_USER.
Audio track ID. This parameter is required only when the source type of the local mixed audio stream is AUDIO_SOURCE_CUSTOM. Set it to the custom audio track ID returned by .
